message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $1,200,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $1,200,000.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. This still gives you a significant discount, and it allows me to make a fair profit. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to consider $1,250,000? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a compromise to make this deal work.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to go down to $1,275,000. This is a very fair price, considering the value of the product. Let's get this deal done!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, so I'll offer $1,225,000. I think this is a fair compromise, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
